item.title: Collectd plugins made easy
item.description: Collectd is a Unix daemon that collects, transfers and stores performance data of computers and network equipment. The acquired data is meant to help system administrators maintain an overview over available resources to detect existing or looming bottlenecks. Collectd provides a long list of plugins available out-of-box. However, if you need to collect additional metrics, one of the easiest ways to do so is using the exec plugin. In order to use the exec plugin, create an Collectd configuration file:
